Rotation Rotation::Rotation::operator+ (  const Rotation &    _rot2 )  const
 

Determine the successive rotation from the summation of two rotations.

_rot2  Rotation to be summed with.

Rotation Rotation::Rotation::operator- (  const Rotation &    _rot2 )  const
